system.effect: Quarters designed to simulate alien environments. +10 to Charm/Inquiry Tests made towards Xenos aboard the vessel. +50 Achievement Points towards Objectives involving Non-Hostile interactings with Xenos. Permenant -2 Morale due to Crew Suspicion
